DataElement.preferredDefinition: A unique identifier for granted eligibility waiver.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Inclusion Exclusion Criteria Not Met Domain Eligibility Waiver
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to the violation of trial inclusion and exclusion criteria of a subject._An approved exemption to the requirement for a participant to meet eligibility criteria prior to study enrollment.  A sponsor-approved waiver is necessary when a subject fails to meet enrollment criteria, but wishes to be accrued to the trial.

Property.preferredDefinition: An approved exemption to the requirement for a participant to meet eligibility criteria prior to study enrollment.  A sponsor-approved waiver is necessary when a subject fails to meet enrollment criteria, but wishes to be accrued to the trial.
